extendedInfo.description: MLS Source Android app puts the MLS in the palm of every memberâs hand. Brought to you by MLSListings, Inc., this app was designed to be used by real estate professionals as well as home buyers and sellers in Northern California. We serve the counties of Monterey, San Benito, San Mateo, Santa Clara, and Santa Cruz, as well as San Joaquin and Stanislaus. MLSListings provides the most accurate, timely and comprehensive real estate information in Northern California.All agents and brokers can sub-brand their app simply entering their MLS username and password. From the app, agents/brokers can share and connect with clients. Features:- Interactive map searching. Using the GPS Location based technology in the Android platform, you can easily find listings located around you or search by entering a specific location.- View properties on Google maps (street, satellite and hybrid).- Search and filter by price, beds, bath, etcâ¦- Easily see all property details, including multiple photos, price, property details and descriptions.- Find your way to the front door with ease, using turn by turn direction capabilities.- Save properties to favorites, save search results, and share properties via text, email, Facebook or Twitter.- Personalized agent view of information accessed through login credentials.Checkout more at: http://portal.mlslistings.com/mlsapps/mls-source-agent-branded-app/

reviews.title: Average
reviews.comment: May need more hits to show all properties
reviews.author: Ami Figueroa

reviews.title: Could be so much better
reviews.comment: Localization doesn\'t work well,  and app crashes frequently. Minimal functionality works OK, but I guess I expect more with the caliber of programmers available to them.
reviews.author: Andrea Ruth

reviews.title: Could be great
reviews.comment: This app could be superior, but its downfall is you are unable to actually scroll through the pictures.
reviews.author: Adam Hallmark

reviews.comment: Love it
reviews.author: Deisy Arreola Lomeli

reviews.title: Best I ever used
reviews.comment: Great tool I use it cause its the most updated app of all!
reviews.author: Aaron Dumas

reviews.title: Very unstable app
reviews.comment: ...It force close constantly
reviews.author: Andres Gutierrez

reviews.title: Not For Agents
reviews.comment: Poor Use of Permissions: Why does it need access to my phone numbers and contacts?   Not For Agents: As far as I can tell this is just a basic search tool. You can\'t access any of your contact or client information or the tagged properties for your clients. Your saved searches are not shared between the matrix and this app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not a good ap
reviews.comment: This app force close constantly.
reviews.author: Kyan Tran

reviews.title: No search results
reviews.comment: Too often search results by zip code are non-existent. Frustrating to use.

reviews.title: Works good for on the go
reviews.comment: I find it reliable and easy to use when I\'m out showing homes to clients.

reviews.title: Helpful but needs work
reviews.comment: Needs a bit of refining for the searches to work properly and to narrow down the searches. The criteria selection is a little confusing. I don\'t like how the default in search is active, pending, and sold. The contact agent button is very helpful.
